Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Monarchy[ENDCOLOR] is good for empires looking to expand through military might.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+0% [ICON_FOOD] Food empire wide.[NEWLINE]+5% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production empire wide.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_GOLD] Gold empire wide.[NEWLINE]+0% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science empire wide.[NEWLINE]-0% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.[NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from garrisoned Cities.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with other Governments and Anarchism.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Theocracy[ENDCOLOR] is best for empires focusing on [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] and Happiness.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_FOOD] Food empire wide.[NEWLINE]+0% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production empire wide.[NEWLINE]+20% [ICON_GOLD] Gold empire wide.[NEWLINE]+0% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science empire wide.[NEWLINE]-20% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from garrisoned Cities.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with other Governments.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Republic[ENDCOLOR] is best for empires emphasizing Specialist.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+5% [ICON_FOOD] Food empire wide.[NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production empire wide.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_GOLD] Gold empire wide.[NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science empire wide.[NEWLINE]-10% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from [ICON_CITIZEN ]Population.[NEWLINE]+0 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from garrisoned Cities.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with other Governments.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Democracy[ENDCOLOR] is grants many bonuses for having a solid infrastructure.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+30% [ICON_FOOD] Food empire wide.[NEWLINE]+0% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production empire wide.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_GOLD] Gold empire wide.[NEWLINE]+20% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science empire wide.[NEWLINE]-20% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.[NEWLINE]+0 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from garrisoned Cities.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with other Governments, Autocracy, Feudalism, and Totalitarianism.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fascism[ENDCOLOR] is perfect for subjugating neighbors with your military superiority.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+0% [ICON_FOOD] Food empire wide.[NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production empire wide.[NEWLINE]+0% [ICON_GOLD] Gold empire wide.[NEWLINE]+0% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science empire wide.[NEWLINE]-30% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.[NEWLINE]+5 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from garrisoned Cities.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with other Governments, Pacifism, Liberalism, Socialism, Anarchism, Pluralism, Constitutional, and Electoral.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Communism[ENDCOLOR] captures the essense of the Industrial Revolution by granting massive bonuses to [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+5% [ICON_FOOD] Food empire wide.[NEWLINE]+30% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production empire wide.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_GOLD] Gold empire wide.[NEWLINE]+0% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science empire wide.[NEWLINE]-10% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.[NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from garrisoned Cities.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with other Governments, Electoral, and Plutocracy.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Corporate[ENDCOLOR] is perfect for empires looking to generate more [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+20% [ICON_FOOD] Food empire wide.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production empire wide.[NEWLINE]+40% [ICON_GOLD] Gold empire wide.[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science empire wide.[NEWLINE]-10% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.[NEWLINE]+0 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from garrisoned Cities.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with other Governments and Populism.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Technocracy[ENDCOLOR] improves the ability to use and generate [ICON_RESEARCH] Science and boosts productivity of Great People.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_FOOD] Food empire wide.[NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production empire wide.[NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_GOLD] Gold empire wide.[NEWLINE]+40% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science empire wide.[NEWLINE]-0% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from garrisoned Cities.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with other Governments, Populism, and Anarchism.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ecotopia[ENDCOLOR] is great for empires looking to expand, both peacefully and not-so-peacefully.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+50% [ICON_FOOD] Food empire wide.[NEWLINE]+5% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production empire wide.[NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_GOLD] Gold empire wide.[NEWLINE]+20% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science empire wide.[NEWLINE]-15% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.[NEWLINE]+0 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from garrisoned Cities.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with other Governments.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Virtual Democracy[ENDCOLOR] is a great Government for improving [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and gereral prosperity.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+25% [ICON_FOOD] Food empire wide.[NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production empire wide.[NEWLINE]+30% [ICON_GOLD] Gold empire wide.[NEWLINE]+5% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science empire wide.[NEWLINE]-30% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.[NEWLINE]+0 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from garrisoned Cities.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with other Governments, Aristocracy, Autocracy, Feudalism, and Totalitarianism..

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pacifism[ENDCOLOR] is best for improving [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with [ICON_CITY_STATE] City-States.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Increases [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in the empire by 2.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Imperialism, Nationalism, Totalitarianism, and Fascism.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Imperialism[ENDCOLOR] is great for empires looking to quickly expand.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Reduces [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from number of cities by 20%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Pacifism and Anarchism.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Populism[ENDCOLOR] is great for increasing the empire's [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from every Monument.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Aristocracy, Plutocracy, Feudalism, Totalitarianism, Corporate and Technocracy

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Capitalism[ENDCOLOR] greatly improves the empire's abiltiy to generate [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+5 [ICON_GOLD] Gold in every City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Socialism.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Liberalism[ENDCOLOR] greatly increases the empire's [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from every Temple.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Autocracy, Feudalism, Totalitarianism, and Fascism

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Conservatism[ENDCOLOR] rewards you for keeping your empire [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] happy.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+100% of excess [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness is added to [ICON_CULTURE] to be used for earning [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policies.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Nationalism[ENDCOLOR] equips the empire with many military bonuses.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A Great General appears outside the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Pacifism and Anarchism.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Socialism[ENDCOLOR] grants bonuses for having the many developed Cities.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+10 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from every Mine.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Aristocracy, Plutocracy, Capitalism and Fascism.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Anarchism[ENDCOLOR] grants many bonuses designed to keep your empire [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] happy.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from every Courthouse.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Imperialism, Nationalism, Autocracy, Feudalism, Parliamentary, Federalism, Totalitarianism, Monarchy, Fascism, and Technocracy.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Environmentalism[ENDCOLOR] rewards the empire for maintaining natural features and protecting the environmnent.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The empire immediately enters a 4-turn [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Aristocracy[ENDCOLOR] is best for small empires.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in each city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Electoral, Populism, Socialism, and Virtual Democracy.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Autocracy[ENDCOLOR] grants many bonuses for the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Increases [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in the empire by 4.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Pluralism, Constitutional, Electoral, Liberalism, Anarchism, Democracy, and Virtual Democracy.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Plutocracy[ENDCOLOR] emphasizes the power of [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from every Market.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Populism, Socialism, and Communism.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pluralism[ENDCOLOR] grants many bonuses for a diverse empire.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in every City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Autocracy, Totalitarianism, and Fascism.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Feudalism[ENDCOLOR] improves many domestic aspects of the empire.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]2 Workers appear near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Federalism, Electoral, Populism, Liberalism, Anarchism, Democracy, and Virtual Democracy

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Parliamentary[ENDCOLOR] enhanses the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital through many peaceful bonuses.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The empire gains +3 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Anarchism.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Constitutional[ENDCOLOR] enhanses the empire's [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for every Courthouse.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Autocracy, Totalitarianism, and Fascism.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Federalism[ENDCOLOR] greatly improves the [ICON_CULTURE] Cultural output of the empire.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+30 [ICON_FOOD] Food in every City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Feudalism and Anarchism.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Electoral[ENDCOLOR] improves the empire's [ICON_GOLD] Gold and [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from every University.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Aristocracy, Feudalism, Autocracy, Totalitarianism, Fascism, Feudalism, and Communism.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Totalitarianism[ENDCOLOR] keepes the empire [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] happy through a series of strict military procedures.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+40 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in every City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Incompatible with Pluralism, Constitutional, Electoral, Pacifism, Populism, Liberalism, Anarchism, Democracy, and Virtual Democracy.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Tribal Kingship[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Military Units gain 1.5 times XP from combat.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Maintenance paid on units reduced by 30%.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Dynasty[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from every Barracks.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A Great General appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Absolute Monarchy[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness in [ICON_OCCUPIED] Occupied Cities reduced by 50%.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Divine Right[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]New Military Units start with an additional 10XP.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Crown Loyalty[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+20% [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength for military Units.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Imperial Cult[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for each city you own [ICON_CONNECTED] connected to the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]State Church[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]50% of excess [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness added each turn to the amount of [ICON_CULTURE] Culture that may be spent on Social Policies.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Senate[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Specialist consume half the normal amount of [ICON_FOOD] Food.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rule of Law[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Specialist Population in Cities produce half the normal amount of [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Mixed Government[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from Specialist in every City.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Representation[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Amount of [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness required to start a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age reduced by 33%.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Separation of Powers[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]The empire immediately enters a 12-turn [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Discipline[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Quantity of Strategic Resources produced by the empire increased by 100%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Maintenance paid on units reduced by 66%.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Spirit[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+30% [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength for attacking Military Units.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Hierarchy[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Military Units gain 3 times XP from combat.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Will[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Military Units always heal, even after moving or attacking.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Comintern[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]All City-States which are [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Allies[ENDCOLOR] provide a [ICON_RESEARCH] Science bonus equal to 25% of what they produce for themselves.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Nationalization[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+20 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from every Workshop and +60 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from every Factory.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Planned Economy[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+20 [ICON_FOOD] Food from every Supermarket.[NEWLINE]+25 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from every Factory.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Utopian Socialism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from every Improvement.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from every Luxury resource.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Executive Board[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Purchasing items in Cities requires 25% less [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Corporate Bylaws[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]A Great Merchant appears outside the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Management Class[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from every Specialist.[NEWLINE]+8 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from every Specialist.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Modes of Action[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+20 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from every Great Person Improvement.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Information Society[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]A Great Scientist appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Post Scarcity[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Rate at which [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People are born increased by 100%.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Eco Fanatacism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Units no longer use [ICON_MOVES] Movement points when pillaging, and they Ignore Terrain Cost.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Precautionary Principle[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from Mass Transit and Recycling Plants.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Amount of [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness required to start a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age reduced by 30%.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Sustainability[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Quantity of Strategic Resources produced by the empire increased by 50%.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Homo Illuminatus[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]30% [ICON_FOOD] Food carried over after a [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen is born.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Open Source Governance[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+5 [ICON_FOOD] Food from every Farm, Fishing Boat, and Pasture.[NEWLINE]+6 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from every Mine, Lumbermill, and Manufactory.[NEWLINE]+10 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from every Trading Post, Plantation, Camp, Quarry, Well, Offshore Platform, and Custom House.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Instant Referendum[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Purchasing items in Cities requires 35% less [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pure Democracy[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+16 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from every Specialist.[NEWLINE]+20 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from every Specialist.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Executive Recall[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Amount of [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness required to start a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age reduced by 50%.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Radical Transparency[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]The empire immediately enters a 20-turn [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Age.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pragmatic Pacifism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Quest completed for [ICON_CITY_STATE] City-States produce 25% more [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Non-Violence[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Gold gifts to [ICON_CITY_STATE] City-States produce 25% more [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Peace[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Allied [ICON_CITY_STATE] City-States will occassionally gift you [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Forcible Imposition[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]A Settler appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Command[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Each City with a garrison increases empire [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness by 1.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Popular Referendum[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]A Great Artist appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Anti Elitism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Increases [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in the empire by 4.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Reform Movement[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]The empire immediately enters a 10-turn [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Economic Freedom[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from every Plantation.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Natural Rights[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Increases [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in the empire by 2.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Human Rights[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]The empire immediately enters a 7-turn [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Traditional Institutions[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+16 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from every Stone Works.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Natural Law[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Each City with a garrison increases empire [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness by 1.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fiscal Conservatism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from every Lumbermill.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Libertarianism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]The empire immediately enters a 10-turn [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Patriotism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Gains [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for the empire from every enemy unit killed.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Popular Sovereignty[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Cities with a garrison gain +100% City [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] Ranged Combat Strength.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Exceptionalism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Every enemy killed earns [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the empire equal to 5x the enemy's [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Means of Production[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from every Workshop.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]State Owned Enterprise[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from every Public School.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Welfare State[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]The empire immediately enters a 15-turn [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Individualism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]A Great Artist appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Spontaneous Order[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Each City with a garrison increase [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in the empire by 2.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Stateless Society[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]-75% [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness required for Golden Ages.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Endangered Species Act[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+9 [ICON_FOOD] Food from every Mill.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Environmental Movement[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from every Lumbermill.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Clean Air Act[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from every Factory.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Deep Ecology[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from every Recycling Plant.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Class Warfare[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Gains [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for the empire from each enemy unit killed equal to one-half of the enemy's [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Nobility[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]A Great Scientist appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cult of Personality[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]A Worker appearns near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Single Party State[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+8 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Unlimited Power[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]The empire immediately enters a 12-turn [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Shadow Party[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from Specialist in every City.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bourgeois[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Purchasing items in Cities requires 20% less [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Common Good[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]A Great Scientist appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]1 free [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Warrior Nobility[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]A Great General appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Oath of Fealty[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+5 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +14 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from every Castle.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Hybrid Model[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from every Mine.[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_FOOD] Food from every Farm.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Proportional Representation[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for every City [ICON_CONNECTED] Connected to the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Head of State[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+18 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.[NEWLINE]+12 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Chambers of Parliament[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]A Great Artist appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Commonwealth[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]The empire immediately enters a 12-turn [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Articles[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]For every Technology researched, the empire gains [ICON_CULTURE] Culture equal to 5% of the Technology Cost.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Judicial Review[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from every Library, University, and Public School.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Reserved Powers[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]3 Musketmen appear near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Federal Courts[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+5 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from every Courthouse.[NEWLINE]+5 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from every Publishing House.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Indirect Elections[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Increases [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in the empire by 3.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]State Media[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]A Great General appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Secret Police[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]3 Infantry appear near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]State Terrorism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +3 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from every Police Station.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Big Brother[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Grants vision of every player's [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.[NEWLINE]For 20 turns, Military Units gain a 30% [ICON_STRENGTH] attacking bonus.

Set.Text: Would you like to adopt {1_NewBranchName:textkey}? Doing so will abandon {2_OldBranches}, and all benefits provided. It will also cause your empire to enter [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Anarchy[ENDCOLOR] for 2 turns, during which it will not collect [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, [ICON_RESEARCH] Science or [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
